revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

__TOC__
==Description==
'''The Monster of the Month system has been replaced with [[Monster of the Week]] system'''.

The Monster of the Month is a type of creature / monster that has a chance of dropping a high-end rares such as skill scrolls, relics and more. As you may have guessed, the monster changes every month! Given the potentially bountiful booty, the monsters will obviously be pursued by many. Stay on your toes if you decide to join in the hunt! For the less common monsters, such as snow elementals, additional spawns may be added.

==Rewards==
In addition to their normal loot, the Monster of the Month can drop:
* [[Meta_Pets#Meta_Dragon|Meta Dragon]] Relics
* [[Meta_Pets#Meta_Steeds|Meta Steed]] Relics
* [[Meta_Talismans|Meta Talisman]] Relics
* [[Skill_Scroll|Skill Scrolls]]
* Rune-etched Chest
* Title Scroll
* Hued Spellbook
* Hued Cloth

Each monster has an associated title scroll and hue, as detailed in the next section.
